message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider coming down to $12,000. This offer represents a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,000. Can you consider this price?
